title: Update Failed
body: Am I the only one that is getting this? http://i.imgur.com/NC6Hlk6.png even when you click repair cause this is getting annoying asf ever since i got windows 10 it be saying http://i.imgur.com/UpADjz5.png and i reinstall uninstall nothing working even with admin league dont work on windows 10 64bit??!?!

replies.body: It looks like the patch was attempting to scan your installation, but was blocked due to a permissions issue.  My recommendation as a first step would be to go through our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide and restore access between Windows and the patcher.
i try using admin it didn't work
